name: Jstacoder.github.io
body:
### Welcome to My World
Come along with me to learn about python, and maybe have some fun along the way, or not. Its kind of up to you.
Im mainly a fan of Flask, Sqlalchemy, amoung other things.

```python
>>> from os import path
>>> print os.path.realpath(os.path.curdir)
>>> print 'Python examples'
```

Here are some projects you might want to see

### [Flask-XXL](https://github.com/jstacoder/flask-xxl)
Flask-XXL was written to help me develop large projects at a fast pace, it has many tools to help do that.

### [Flask-CMS](https://github.com/jstacoder/flask-cms)
Flask-Cms is still a WIP, but its got many nice features already.

### [Flask-Apps](https://github.com/jstacoder/flask-apps)
Flask extension to support auto app loading

### [Flask-SA-Restful-Resource](https://github.com/jstacoder/flask-sa-restful-resource)
extension to flask-restless, to support auto resource loading

### [Flask-Angular-Blog](https://github.com/jstacoder/flask-angular-blog)
small blog implemented with flask backend, and angular frontend

### [Flask-Ide](https://github.com/jstacoder/flask-ide)
web based ide, built on flask and ace editor 

### [Flask-Template-Loader](https://github.com/jstacoder/flask-template-loader)
control your template loader

[My blog](kyle-vm.level2designs.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
